page.title: 17NEW DEVELOPMENTS IN CARLTON
page.content: THE FORMER ST PAULS C.E SCHOOL ON CARLTON HILL IS BEING DEMOLISHED. PLANNING PERMISSION HAS BEEN SOUGHT TO BUILD A SUPERMARKET. IT WOULD COVER 30,000 SQ FT AND PROVIDE 425 PARKING SPACES. IN NETHERFIELD ON VICTORIA RD THERE IS A HOUSING DEVELOPMENT CALLED BRITTANIA COURT.IT CONSISTS OF 152 DWELLINGS AND IS BUILT ON THE SITE OF THE FORMER WARP KNITTING FACTORY KNOWN AS BRITTANIA MILLS. THERE IS A PRIVATE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT ON MARHILL RD,OFF STATION RD CONSISTING OF 68 DWELLINGS. AT GREENHILL RISE,CHURCH ST,CARLTON,A DEPOT HAS BEEN DEMOLISHED AND PLANNING PERMISSION HAS BEEN GRANTED TO BUILD 26 HOUSES.
